text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Cost of providing a system product" means the cost to create, develop, and reproduce the product in printed or hard copy form.
"Cost of providing a system service" means the actual cost of providing the service, including a reasonable share of the overhead costs of the system.

section.section:
"System" means an automated mapping-geographic information system in which geographically referenced data:
are entered and stored electronically; and
can be manipulated to display selected geographic data.
"System" includes data that define physical and nonphysical elements of geographically referenced areas.

text.section: "System products" means drawings, lists, maps, narrative descriptions, photographs, or other hard copy formats that depict spatial data.

"System services" means:
electronic access to data in the system;
online access to data in the system; and
software programs to access data in the system.
